Validation Methodology

This section outlines the standardized, multi-phase process for developing, testing, and validating any stock selection algorithm within the STOCKSUNIFY ecosystem.

Phase 1: In-Sample Optimization

The algorithm's parameters are tuned on a historical dataset (e.g., 2020-2023) to find the optimal settings that maximize a target metric like Sharpe Ratio. This phase is for discovery and fitting.

Phase 2: Out-of-Sample Validation

The optimized algorithm is run once on unseen data (e.g., 2024-Present). If its performance degrades significantly (e.g., >30%) from the in-sample results, it is considered overfit and rejected.

Phase 3: Live Forward-Testing

The "Truth Engine" tracks the real-world performance of deployed algorithms by checking their results after the recommended holding period. This provides the ultimate, unbiased measure of success.
